newsItem.title: Not Many Posts In this Category.
newsItem.author: AUTHOR: FlashJunkie (HTML Text)
newsItem.preview: This is the HTML Formatted preview text for the post, its defined seperatly from the main post. The read more button for this post opens the full post.
newsItem.body:
This field is driven by XML and is HTML formatted, allowing you to use flash compatible html tags to format your text. Change font size and you can also change font colour or make text bold italic or underlined. You can also make any combination of the above like so... Bold, Italic and underlined larger text in a red colour This text links to flashden.

  • Embed images using img tags.
  • Align the image.





  • This image is aligned to the right.

Sed sollicitudin congue massa. Sed eleifend velit at tortor. Aenean libero. Aenean blandit suscipit metus. Suspendisse non ipsum non massa congue vehicula. Curabitur sed ipsum vel ligula scelerisque posuere. Aenean eros velit, dictum non, ultricies nec, interdum quis, risus. Phasellus ac est. Quisque bibendum. In facilisis. Vestibulum tincidunt. Morbi sapien. Nulla nunc velit, auctor in, faucibus non, condimentum quis, risus. Nullam tempus eleifend augue. Sed metus mauris, tincidunt eu, auctor quis, congue ac, purus. In nisi lorem, fermentum at, auctor sed, placerat vitae, libero. Proin felis urna, tempor at, tincidunt aliquam, euismod id, felis. Fusce tellus felis, faucibus et, bibendum sed, luctus nec, ligula.
